message: I'll take 90% and leave you 10%. This way we both get a good share, and we can finish the game quickly. What do you say?
Take a smaller share now and avoid risking getting nothing!
I'm willing to split the money more evenly this time, 60/40. It's still a good deal for both of us, and we can avoid further inflation.
You're getting greedy, Alice. Take this and we can finish the game.
I think we're both being too stubborn. Let's split the money evenly and call it a day.  It's better than risking getting nothing at all.
